marytts.util.io
Class MaryRandomAccessFile

java.lang.Object
  java.io.RandomAccessFile
      marytts.util.io.MaryRandomAccessFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput
public final class MaryRandomAccessFile
extends java.io.RandomAccessFile

A class that extends RandomAccessFile to read/write arrays of different types while allowing random access to a binary file (i.e. the file can be opened in both read/write mode and there is support for moving the file pointer to any location as required

Author:
Oytun Türk
